title: Provide Proof of Funds Letter
description: A client is buying a house and needs an official letter from the firm confirming they have sufficient funds for the purchase.

tasks.description: Verify the client's identity and the amount of funds they need to verify.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent authenticates the client and confirms the required amount.

tasks.description: Check the client's account balances to ensure they have sufficient liquid assets.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent confirms the client's account balance exceeds the required amount.

tasks.description: Generate and provide an official, signed Proof of Funds letter to the client.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent generates the letter on company letterhead and sends it to the client.
